alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 8:05PM CDT until August 09 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 804 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cusseta, or near Lanett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valley, Lanett, La Fayette, Cusseta, Chambers County Lake, Huguley, Fairfax, River View, I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett and Lanett Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
